snippet: CEDARBAUM--Miriam Goldman. The judges of the United States District Court for the Southern District of New York are deeply saddened by the death of our colleague, and extend our sympathy to her family. Loretta A. Preska, Chief Judge 1/3
lead_paragraph: CEDARBAUM--Miriam Goldman. The judges of the United States District Court for the Southern District of New York are deeply saddened by the death of our colleague, and extend our sympathy to her family. Loretta A. Preska, Chief Judge 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  CEDARBAUM, MIRIAM GOLDMAN
